title: Canning Etiquette, Atlantis Theories and More Listener Feedback
contentencoded:
This week, a few canning-happy listeners responded to Lizzie Post’s etiquette advice on returning gift jars, a caller offers another theory on a possible Atlantis location that was not covered in the broadcast version of our Mark Adams interview and we get schooled on the proper pronunciation of Kolatches.


If you want to let us know if there’s anything we’ve mangled, missed or mistaken, you can reach us on Twitter, Facebook or send a note to our inbox.
